pageContext.claim: “And I saved the energy business. I got Russia and I got Saudi Arabia on the phone, and they cut way back. And we're now at $40-and-plus a barrel. And we're saving tens of millions of jobs in energy. We're the number-one in energy in the world.”
pageContext.analysis: Oil prices are still roughly half what they were at the beginning of 2020. Analysts have warned a coronavirus resurgence could add more instability to the market.
